name: Magnet Destroyer
description:
Summary

Magnet Destroyer is a game created for ScoreSpace Jam #18, by a Solo Unity Developer. The goal is to get the highest score. The genre, I would say, is a Hyper Casual, Endless Runner. Wreak havoc in an office to gain score. You play as a magnet and must use your magnetic forces to stay alive and gain score. 

How to Play:

You play as a Magnet and you rack up score by destroying an endless office and staying alive. Avoid blue magnetic forces when you are red and avoid red magnetic forces when you are  blue. Launch objects at green blocks to destroy them with your magnetic powers.

Controls:
  • Move: A\D or ←\→ or Left Stick Gamepad
  • Magnetize\De-Magnetize: Space or Button South Gamepad
  • Select: Enter or Button South Gamepad
Unique Selling Features:
  • Magnetism!
  • Simple Controls
  • Fun for all ages
  • Easily scalable for all Platforms, more levels, different characters, etc..
  • Unique UI
  • LootLocker Hi-Score Leaderboard
